member.name: EncoderParameterValueType
member.summary: The EncoderParameterValueType enumeration specifies data types for image codec (encoder/decoder) parameters. An element of this enumeration is assigned to theType data member of an EncoderParameter object.

member.name: EncoderParameterValueType.EncoderParameterValueTypeByte
member.summary: Specifies that the parameter is an 8-bit unsigned integer.

member.name: EncoderParameterValueType.EncoderParameterValueTypeASCII
member.summary: Specifies that the parameter is a null-terminated character string.

member.name: EncoderParameterValueType.EncoderParameterValueTypeShort
member.summary: Specifies that the parameter is a 16-bit unsigned integer.

member.name: EncoderParameterValueType.EncoderParameterValueTypeLong
member.summary: Specifies that the parameter is a 32-bit unsigned integer.

member.name: EncoderParameterValueType.EncoderParameterValueTypeRational
member.summary: Specifies that the parameter is an array of two, 32-bit unsigned integers. The pair of integers represents a fraction. The first integer in the pair is the numerator, and the second integer in the pair is the denominator.

member.name: EncoderParameterValueType.EncoderParameterValueTypeLongRange
member.summary: Specifies that the parameter is an array of two, 32-bit unsigned integers. The pair of integers represents a range of numbers. The first integer is the smallest number in the range, and the second integer is the largest number in the range.

member.name: EncoderParameterValueType.EncoderParameterValueTypeUndefined
member.summary: Specifies that the parameter is an array of bytes that can hold values of any type.

member.name: EncoderParameterValueType.EncoderParameterValueTypeRationalRange
member.summary: Specifies that the parameter is an array of four, 32-bit unsigned integers. The first two integers represent one fraction, and the second two integers represent a second fraction. The two fractions represent a range of rational numbers. The first fraction is the smallest rational number in the range, and the second fraction is the largest rational number in the range.

member.name: EncoderParameterValueType.EncoderParameterValueTypePointer
member.summary: Specifies that the parameter is a pointer to a block of custom metadata.
